summary: The 76th Primetime Emmy Awards celebrated the best TV shows and actors from June 2023 to May 2024. The ceremony was held in September 2024 in Los Angeles, with Eugene and Dan Levy as hosts. Three shows, *Baby Reindeer*, *The Bear*, and *Shōgun*, each won four awards, including big categories like Outstanding Limited Series and Outstanding Drama Series. Other winners included *Hacks*, *The Crown*, and *Fargo*. *Shōgun* had the most total wins, and FX had the most wins among networks. It was a night full of excitement and celebration for the TV industry!
title: 76th Primetime Emmy Awards
